description: Community Land Model family representing land surface heterogeneity through nested subgrid hierarchy.
common_scientific_basis: Nested subgrid representation, area-weighted averaging for atmosphere-land coupling.
evolution: Evolution from simple land surface to comprehensive terrestrial system models through CLM1-CLM5.
shared_code_base: Nested subgrid hierarchy architecture with independent biogeophysical processes per landunit/column/PFT.
variation_dimensions: Version complexity, soil layers, vegetation representation, biogeochemical complexity.
